name: jsStringFormat
description:
Escapes special JavaScript characters, such as single quotation
 mark, double quotation mark, and newline

links.title: Learning jsStringFormat by Ben Nadel
links.description: Tutorial showing how to use jsStringFormat

examples.title: jsStringFormat Example
examples.description: This example illustrates use of the JSStringFormat function.
examples.code:
string = "An example string value with ""quoted"" 'text'";
 writeOutput(JSStringFormat(string)) ;
